steps.title: We’re sorry to see you go
steps.text: If you’re leaving, make sure you download your data from the ‘Review’ tab so that you have it for your  reference. Best wishes!
steps.placeholder: (OPTIONAL) Parting words for us, or things that we could have done better? Please do not include any personal health information here
steps.alertTitle: Are you sure you want to withdraw?
steps.alertMessage: We won’t be able to recover your account information and data after withdrawing from the study
